availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Abel Franklin (Johnson County and Floyd County, laborer and soldier)

body.p: Johnson County, Kentucky and Floyd County, Kentucky, laborer and soldier. Scott County, Virginia native. Son of Abe Franklin and Elizabeth Jefferson Franklin. Married to Cynthia A. Franklin. Father of Sarah M. Franklin and Margaret E. Franklin. Laborer in Floyd County in 1850. Served in the 65th Regiment of Kentucky Militia as corporal from May 21, 1864 to June 21, 1864.
